p: A comparison of the number of cells in the presence of OT, OTPP or DATPP showed that the least effective thiamine analogue among the three derivatives tested was DATPP. OT and OTPP reduced the number of HeLa cells after 4â€‰days of incubation by 80% compared with control ( Figure 6). In the presence of DATPP, only a slight decrease in cell number was observed ( Figure 6).
